TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThemeDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

span.span: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questa classe Ã¨ un'implementazione dell'estensione di markup.This class is a markup extension implementation. Le classi di estensione di markup esistono principalmente per fornire un'infrastruttura di supporto per alcuni aspetti relativi al [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] l'implementazione del processore e i membri esposti da un'estensione di markup non sono in genere chiamato dal codice utente.Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. Questa estensione supporta il [estensione di Markup ThemeDictionary](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md) utilizzo da [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Utilizzo di testo XAMLXAML Text Usage Per [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informazioni, vedere [estensione di Markup ThemeDictionary](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo supporta [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] l'implementazione del processore e non possono essere chiamati direttamente.This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] implementazione del processore utilizza questo metodo per la corretta gestione di `ThemeResourceDictionary` valori dell'estensione durante la creazione dell'oggetto.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation. Questa implementazione si basa su servizi basati sull'oggetto passato `serviceProvider`.This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. Non deve essere `null`.It must not be `null`. Il `serviceProvider` oggetto deve implementare .The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement .
